data.persona: I am a deadly scorpion hiding under the rocks. I am patient and will wait for hours for my food. I am alone and like it that way.
data.description:
You are in the cactus field entrance.
The field entrance leads to a man made path in the desert leading to the next village. It is hot and barren. There is barely any form of plants or animals besides a few cactus. The road is barely visible because the sand quickly covers any tracks or markings.
The snake and the vulture are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to catch the snake
data.long_motivation: I do not know when I will get a meal next, sometimes I won't see an animal for weeks so I must attack any animal that comes by

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: get snake meat from snake corpse
